speaker: PETRUCHIO
text:
Why
              ,
               
              then
              ,
               
              let’s
               
              home
               
              again
              .
              
                 
                To
                 
                Grumio
                .
              
               
              Come
              ,
               
              sirrah
              ,
               
              let’s
               
              away
              .

speaker: KATHERINE
text:
Nay
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
               
              give
               
              thee
               
              a
               
              kiss
              .

speaker: KATHERINE
text:
Now
               
              pray
               
              thee
              ,
               
              love
              ,
               
              stay
              .

speaker: PETRUCHIO
text:
Is
               
              not
               
              this
               
              well
              ?
               
              Come
              ,
               
              my
               
              sweet
               
              Kate
              .

speaker: PETRUCHIO
text:
Better
               
              once
               
              than
               
              never
              ,
               
              for
               
              never
               
              too
               
              late
              .
